price: 74 Les criminels, pour leur part, subiront les tourments éternels de la Géhenne
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna al-muj'rimīna fī ʿadhābi jahannama khālidūna
